name: Zesty Carrot Bake

ingredients.name: lb. carrots, cut into 1/2 inch slices

instructions: On stovetop or microwave oven, cook carrots until tender. Place in a 1 quart baking dish; set aside. In a small bowl combine the next 5 ingredients; mix well. Pour over carrots. Combine bread crumbs and butter; sprinkle on top. Bake uncovered at 350Â° for 25 to 30 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese. Return to oven for 2 to 3 minutes or until cheese melts.
